               London/NY Dialogue            REIT Symposium            Sustainable Real Estate Conference            Urban Leadership Award Dinner                                                                                                   47th Annual Conference on Capital Markets in Real Estate                              The Millennial Real Estate Generation: Cyber Age Approach to Investing, Financing, Shopping, and Living              The expansion of the global real estate capital markets for senior/subordinated debt and public/private equity has ignited financing, acquisition, and development beyond historic peaks. Opportunities abound as liquidity flows in the U.S. and investors seek compelling investment returns amidst European market recovery.   The real estate landscape is being transformed by new drivers of demand and productivity from the "millennial generation," our largest cohort of deep-pocketed, sophisticated consumers. Their desire for individual freedom, work-life flexibility, and access to communal social networking space and technology is creating new waves of dynamism in the office, residential, retail, and hospitality real estate sectors.   Join real estate leaders and a deep bench of other industry participants at the 47th Annual Conference on Capital Markets in Real Estate on November 19, 2014.         Conference Information     Date: November 19, 2014   Location: The Pierre Hotel   Grand Ballroom   New York, NY               Sponsorship Opportunities            For inquiries on sponsorship opportunities, please contact Jessica Estrada-Watson at jessica.watson@nyu.edu or call (212) 992-3618 .              Chair        Robert S. Blumenthal  Managing Director, Deutsche Bank Securities Inc.;  Executive Committee Member, Schack Institute of Real Estate                Co-Chairs          Jeffrey A. Barclay  Managing Director, Goldman, Sachs & Co.;  Executive Committee Member, Schack Institute of Real Estate           Richard A. Kessler  Chief Operating Officer, Benenson Capital Partners, LLC;  Executive Committee Member and Adjunct Associate Professor, Schack Institute of Real Estate           Wendy Silverstein  Executive Vice President, Co-Head–Acquisitions and Capital Markets, Vornado Realty Trust                                                                                                      QUICK LINKS                        About Us          Student Affairs          Visit Us          School-wide Policies          Contact Us                       ATTEND THE SCHOOL                        Graduate Admissions          Undergraduate Admissions          Noncredit Registration                             ON THE WEB                         On Facebook          On Twitter          On YouTube          Browser Requirements                                                        NYU Homepage    © New York University School of Professional Studies | Privacy Policy

Patrons and Sponsors                                                                                                           Conferences and Events                                   Conference on Capital Markets in Real Estate     The Conference on Capital Markets in Real Estate features a distinguished roster of industry leaders analyzing market trends and sharing investment strategies for U.S. commercial real estate.           Learn More       London/New York Dialogue   The London/New York Dialogue takes an in-depth look at future plans and investment initiatives that are expected for the transportation systems of each of these global cities.           Learn More       REIT Symposium     The REIT Symposium provides a vibrant forum for senior executives to discuss the latest trends and factors impacting real estate investment trusts.           Learn More       Sustainable Real Estate Conference     The Sustainable Real Estate Conference brings together industry experts to discuss the most pressing issues related to climate change, resource efficiency, and the built environment.           Learn More       Urban Leadership Award Dinner     The Urban Leadership Award Dinner salutes prominent professionals who have contributed significantly to the growth and prestige of the real estate industry.
